name: Welcome to the Table!
description:
In this game we welcome an unexpected guest to our table and find that despite our differences, we all belong. 

3 - 7 players | 10 to 30 minutes.

This game was made for #Matzojam 2021 

It is inspired by my mom who loves improv theater. I love you mom!

Image: "Table d'Hote at a Dogs' Home" by John Charles Dollman (1879)
